quote: The only way to get good at sales is to suck at sales for a long time.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Make people an offer so good they would feel stupid saying no.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The goal is not to get rich. The goal is to solve problems.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Your business is only as valuable as the pain it solves and the dream it sells.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Volume creates luck. The more you do, the luckier you get.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Most people overestimate what they can do in a day and underestimate what they can do in a year.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Price is only an issue in the absence of value.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: If you're not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you launched too late.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The difference between successful people and unsuccessful people is their ability to take action.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Stop trying to make a little bit of money from a lot of people. Make a lot of money from a few people.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: You don't need more opportunities. You need to take advantage of the ones you have.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The best marketing is a great product. Everything else is just noise.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Losers have goals. Winners have systems.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The only people who don't fail are people who don't try.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Your reputation is built on what you do, not what you say you'll do.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: If you want different results, you need different inputs.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The best time to start was yesterday. The second best time is now.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Success is not about working hard. It's about working on the right things.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Your network is your net worth, but only if you provide value first.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Don't compete on price. Compete on value, and price becomes irrelevant.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The obstacle is the way. Every problem is an opportunity in disguise.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: You can't manage what you don't measure. Track everything that matters.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Confidence comes from keeping promises to yourself.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: The market doesn't care about your effort. It only cares about your results.
author: Alex Hormozi

quote: Your biggest limitation is the story you tell yourself about who you are.
author: Alex Hormozi
